mk.tmdb.core

Class TMDbConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • mk.tmdb.core.TMDbConfiguration

  • public class TMDbConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains the configuration information. First of all is necessary to load these information calling load method. Then if you want to be sure that the configuration is up to date call the forceLoad method.
    Author:
    mirkopolato
